message: Let's get this started! I'll give you a fair share, but don't expect me to go easy on you.
Let's split it evenly. No need to play games, I'm confident we can reach a fair agreement.
I'm not sure I want to give you half of the money. I think I can do better than that.
You're being too optimistic about reaching a fair agreement. I'll give you a slightly better offer, but don't think this is the end of the game.
